Vulnerability.Title: yum-langpacks bug fix update
Vulnerability.Description: The yum-langpacks package contains a plug-in for the Yum package manager that enables automatic installation of language packs for your current locale when the base packages with language packs are installed or updated. This update fixes the following bug: Previously, when performing complete installation using the GNOME package set, the manual pages package for Chinese was missing from the installation. A patch has been applied to fix this bug. Now, when the zh_CN locale is selected, the man-pages-zh-CN package is also installed. (BZ#1165731) Users of yum-langpacks are advised to upgrade to this updated package, which fixes this bug. Note for remediation: Please disable the SELinux for RHEL 4/5 when repairing, or some rpm packages will fail to install.
